Package com.msasc.lib.db

Class RecordList

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.RecordSet
com.msasc.lib.db.RecordList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Record>
public class RecordList extends RecordSet
A RecordSet backed by an array list of records. If the source was a database table or view, operations like add, set or remove are not persistent.
Author:
Miquel Sas
